plan.title: Add copy_with() method for immutable-style updates

tdd_phases.green: Add copy_with(**kwargs) -> Todo method to Todo class

acceptance_criteria: todo.copy_with(done=True) returns new Todo instance, original unchanged
copy_with() supports overriding text, done, updated_at fields
New instance's created_at preserved from original
risks_limitations: Minimal risk - additive feature only, no existing behavior changed
Uses existing asdict() and from_dict() patterns already in codebase
